Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Harlem
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Oak Park, Addison, Harlem & Belmont: due to street blockage near Belmont/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Oak Park, Addison, Harlem, then resume their normal route on Belmont: due to street blockage near Belmont/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.
